<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4054</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Geometrical Patterns</string>
            <string language="es">Modelos geométricos</string>
            <string language="ga">Pátrúin  Geoiméadracha</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrische Muster</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Configurations Géométriques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testes padrões Geométricos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Modelli Geometrici</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γεωμετρικά πρότυπα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet requiring students to draw two intricate and interesting patterns to specific dimensions.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que requiere que los estudiantes dibujen dos patrones complejos e interesantes para especificar dimensiones.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre ina dtarraingníonn na daltaí dhá phátrún casta agus suimiúil le toisí ar leith.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Technical Graphics</string>
            <string language="es">Gráficos técnicos. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Grafaic Theicniúil</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen, der Kursteilnehmer benötigt, zwei 
schwierig und interessante Muster zu zeichnen zu den spezifischen 
Maßen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau exigeant des étudiants de dessiner deux 
complexes et configurations intéressantes aux dimensions 
spécifiques.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha que requer estudantes desenhar dois 
intricados e testes padrões interessantes às dimensões 
específicas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro che richiede agli allievi di 
dissipare due complicati ed i modelli interessanti alle dimensioni 
specifiche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας που απαιτεί τους σπουδαστές για να 
σύρει δύο περίπλοκα και ενδιαφέροντα πρότυπα στις συγκεκριμένες 
διαστάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Technische Graphiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Graphiques Techniques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Gráficos Técnicos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Grafici Tecnici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τεχνική γραφική παράσταση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
